item.title: PhD in Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Started PhD in Artificial Intelligence at University of East London. My research is focused on Compound Flood Risk Modelling using AI Relevant Modules: ML using PySpark, Cloud Computing, Big Data using Hadoop & Spark, Information Security.

item.title: Automatic Beat Rate Detection in cardiomyocytes using Computer Vision
item.description: Proposed innovative system for automatic beat rate detection in human heart cells using image processing and machine learning.Validated the system on a dataset of 96 Gigabyte video clips Currently working to publish this research.

item.title: Research Assistant @ University of East London
item.description: Conducted analysis on video clips containing cardiomyocytes to detect beat rate and other parameters. Developed predictive models for Network Intrusion detection system using Python and Spark. Implemented Power BI dashboard for academic departments, enhancing efficiency by 15%

item.title: MSc Big Data Technologies
item.description: Achieved Distinction in Masters of Science: Big Data Technologies from University of East London. Relevant Modules: ML using PySpark, Cloud Computing, Big Data using Hadoop & Spark, Information Security.

item.title: Intrusion Detection using Pyspark
item.description: Used dataset to build ML models in PySpark to detect if the incoming traffic is a threat, and also classify itâ€™s type. Complete ML procedure was followed such as Data Pre-Processing, Dealing with Data Imbalance, Feature Selection, Performance Measurement etc.

item.title: Personality Prediction using NLP
item.description: Built a Web-app using flask which predicts personality of a person from text using NLP. On this project, I learned a lot about python, NLTK, Spacy, Flask.

item.title: Software Developer @ Hudas Technologies
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production

item.title: Software Developer @ PES College
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production

item.title: Bachelors in Computer Science Engineering
item.description: Achieved Distinction in Bachelor of Technology: Computer Science Engineering from Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Technological University, India. Relevant Modules: Python, R, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Mathematics, Data Structures, IT Laws.
